conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and breathable undershirts that I can wear for lounging and sleeping. It's important to me that they have a good fit and are made of quality material. within my expected price range: [14.18, 18.99]

Based on your budget range and preferences, I recommend the Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design (Item ID: B07BTSGMCV) priced at $11.98. This undershirt is made of soft cotton, perfect for lounging and sleeping. If you're interested, I also have another option that might fit your budget range: <potentially purchasable candidate>. Would you like to consider this alternative?
I would like to learn more about the alternative option you mentioned. What are the key features of the <potentially purchasable candidate>?

The Fruit of the Loom Women's Breathable Underwear (Regular & Plus Size) (Item ID: B0C547R51F) priced at $29.48 is another option you might consider. It is made of breathable micro-mesh fabric for all-day freshness and comfort. The low rise brief silhouette offers full seat coverage, and it comes in a convenient 6 pack.
